an9.6:3.5: ‘imam kho me puggalam sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti;
an9.6:3.6: ye ca kho me pabbajitena jivitaparikkhara samudanetabba civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhara te ca kasirena samudagacchanti;
an9.6:3.7: yassa camhi atthaya agarasma anagariyam pabbajito so ca me samannattho na bhavanaparipurim gacchati’ti, tenavuso, puggalena so puggalo rattibhagam va divasabhagam va sankhapi anapuccha pakkamitabbam nanubandhitabbo.
